a global catastrophe almost wipes mankind from the face of the earth and you must survive in an inhospitable world . violent gangs control society club law is the only kind that counts .一个全球性的灾害几乎摧毁地球表面，你必须拯救这个荒凉的世界，黑帮控制了整个社会，暴力是唯一的方法。
